subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Just imagination!

"I think it is always ok to propose a theory that some instance like this m=
ight be a real giant head, floating in thje sky."

LOL!!!! I HATE it when t=
hat happens!

----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rj 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, April 08, 2009 2:21 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] Just imagination!





        I think it is always ok to propose a the=
ory that some instance like this might be a real giant head, floating in th=
je sky.  But then, you have to ask stuff like, ok, are there better or easi=
er or more realistic explanations of what this could be?  In this case, sin=
ce we know clouds can form shapes that look like other things, and since we=
 know we can see shapes in clouds that aren't there, and since as far as we=
 know there are very few giant floating heads in the sky, then in this case=
, I agree, that the most intelligent course is to overide the giant head th=
eory and replace it with an "I'm experiencing pareidolia" theory.  And let =
that one hold, until some more compelling evidence proposes perhaps a diffe=
rent theory.




        --- On Wed, 4/8/09, Frank Sumption <purplealiengir=
l@...> wrote:


          From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@gmail=
.com>
          Subject: [EVP-ITC] Just imagination!
          To: grasshar=
p@yahoogroups.com, evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Wednesday, April=
 8, 2009, 12:33 PM



          Or is it!? (cloud faces) I think in this ca=
se it's mostly imagination. 

           F-S
